articles.title: Grand Evening of Fireworks Held
articles.content:
Grand Evening of Fireworks Held
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A grand evening of fireworks "Fireworks for Building Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation" was held on the bank of the Taedong River here on Tuesday evening to commemorate the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bank of the river and the roads facing the Tower of the Juche Idea were crowded with hundreds of thousands of citizens from all walks of life who gathered to watch the fireworks.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il took the tribune of honor.
					
					 He warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the crowd and sincerely congratulated them on the Day of the Sun, the greatest national holiday.
					
					 The tribune of honor was also taken by senior party, army and state officials Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yong Chun, Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Il Chol, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Ki Nam.
					
					 Watching the fireworks were officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media organs, persons of merit, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas compatriots' delegations and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign guests, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Amid the solemn playing of songs "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" fireworks were displayed in the sky to brightly illuminate the torch atop the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Then followed the display of multi-color confetti-like fireworks working wonders and presenting spectacular scenery in the nocturnal sky with exciting sound.
					
					 Fireworks displayed in succession presenting the most fascinating and beautiful scenery in the nocturnal sky seemed to be the Korean people's expression of their profound reverence for Kim Il Sung, the peerless legendary hero and eternal sun of the nation.
					
					 The sky over the city was reminiscent of a huge garden with flowers of all species in full bloom as it was more gorgeously decorated with fireworks of various shapes and colors with the passage of time.
					
					 The evening of fireworks mesmerized the spectators as it instilled conviction of sure victory and optimism into the servicepersons and people and promised a rosy future of the Korean revolution.
					
					 As the evening was over, the crowd broke into rousing cheers of "hurrah!" and loud voices extending the best wishes to leader Kim Jong Il, turning the capital city in the evening into a sea of loyalists.
					
					 Kim Jong Il warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering crowd.
					
					 The evening of fireworks strikingly demonstrated the firm faith and will of the army and the people of the DPRK to hold the President in high esteem as the sun of the nation forever and eternally glorify his immortal revolutionary exploits and successfully accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung across the country to lay floral baskets on the occasion of his 97th birth anniversary.
					 Seen before the statue of the President on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Placed there were floral baskets in the name of the party, the armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, and organs and enterprises at all levels, factories, farms and schools in Pyongyang and flowers.
					
					 The people paid profound tribute to him looking up to his statue recalling with deep emotion his noble life as a peerlessly great man who performed undying exploits for the era, the revolution, the country and the people.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before the statues of the President in several units in Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons of the KPA, working people and school youth and children visited the statues of the President standing in their residential areas to place floral baskets, bouquets and flowers.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairman of a friendly party and leading officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Wednesday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Amidst the playing of "Song of General Kim Il Sung" a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the WPK Central Military Commission, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet was placed before his statue.
					
					 The participants paid humble reverence to the statue looking up to the President who built a socialist power dignified with independence which guarantees prosperity of all generations to come in this land.
					
					 Commanding officers of the Korean People's Army also visited the palace on the same day to pay deep respect to the President, founder of the revolutionary armed forces and ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 Also among the visitors were anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, KPA servicepersons and people from all walks of life.
					
					 Foreigners including the diplomatic corps, the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here, delegations and delegates of the groups for the study of the Juche idea and delegations participating in the 11th Kimilsungia Festival and overseas Koreans' delegations and overseas Koreans also visited the palace Wednesday to pay homage to the President.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairman of a friendly party and leading officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited Mangyongdae on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They went to the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum to go round
					
					historic relics and materials which bear witness to the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and the history of the struggle waged by the revolutionary family in Mangyongdae which produced ardent patriots and indomitable fighters.
					
					 Then they moved to his birthplace in Mangyongdae where they looked round historic relics preserved with utmost care.
					
					 They had a photograph taken in front of the old home.

articles.title: Friendly Gathering with Indonesian Embassy Officials Held
articles.content:
Friendly Gathering with Indonesian Embassy Officials Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering with staff members of the Indonesian embassy here took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on April 14 on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of the historic visit to Indonesia paid by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in company with President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy and Indonesian guests staying in the DPRK.
					
					 Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Speakers at the gathering described Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia as a historic event that opened a new chapter of the DPRK-Indonesia friendship, expressing the belief that the long-standing bilateral relations of friendship would grow stronger in the future, too.
					
					 The participants in the gathering enjoyed an art performance of students and talked about the need to further develop the bilateral ties. And they deepened the friendship, singing songs and dancing.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Il from AINDF
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Il from AINDF
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secreatry Kim Jong Il received a letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on April 15 on the occasion of the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The letter said that Kim Il Sung's rise as the sun of Juche was a great fortune in the history of the nation spanning 5,000 years as it brought the dawn of national restoration to the land of three thousand-ri and a historic event in which the era of independence dawned on the road of the nation and mankind.
					
					 It praised the President as a benefactor of national resurrection and  iron-willed commander as he defeated the formidable enemies, the  U.S. and Japanese imperialists by exploring the path of the unique Songun revolution and successfully implementing the line of attaching importance to army and military affairs and the father of socialist Korea as he successfully led the social revolution at two stages and socialist construction of various stages to build a power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, on the land of the north with his extraordinary leadership. 
					
					 The President successfully solved the issue of succession to the leadership by making insight into the historical necessity of the issue of carrying forward the cause of Juche with rare clairvoyance, the letter noted, adding that this is the most shining exploit the President performed by enabling the fellow countrymen to be blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il comprehensively developed in depth the Songun idea and line advanced by the President and ushered in the new era of the Juche revolution, the era of Songun with his outstanding Songun politics. He has foiled every move of the reactionaries at home and abroad against the DPRK, fully demonstrating the sovereignty of the country and national dignity before the whole world.
					
					  The reelection of Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly has brought about a new historic turning point in accomplishing the President's cause of building a rich and powerful nation and the Korean people's cause of national reunification.
					
					 The letter evinced the resolution of the AINDF to hold the President in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and firmly defend his immortal exploits and add shine to them.

articles.title: Delegates of Institutes of Juche Idea Arrive
articles.content:
Delegates of Institutes of Juche Idea Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and Harish Gupta, secretary general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Workers Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Workers Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the workers' art squad of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on April 14 to commemorate the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In the numbers such as chorus "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" and women's chorus "Forty Million People Sing of the Leader" the performers sang high praises of the immortal revolutionary feats of the President who fathered the immortal Juche idea to show the road ahead of the times and the revolution and built a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence in the country with his rare leadership and through his energetic revolutionary activities.
					
					Serial songs "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "The Mind Following the General", dialogic poem "The Torch of Kangson" and other numbers made the audience more keenly feel the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il creditably materializing the President's far-reaching plan on building the country.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers vividly representing the workers working miracles and innovations in the general advance to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Pyong Phal, chairman of the Central Committee of the federation, and trade union officials and members.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean people significantly commemorated the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Art performances were given throughout the country to commemorate the day of the sun.
					
					 The Samjiyon Music Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe performed at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre in the capital city.
					
					 Put on the stage were music "Song of Mangyongdae," music to the accompaniment to violin "Thought of the general," instrumental music and song "Father is on the front" and "Let's drink toasts" and other numbers.
					
					Performed at theatres and halls of culture and open-air stages in North Phyongan, Ryanggang, Kangwon and other provinces were female duet and dance "Spring holiday, the day of the sun," dance "The snow falls" and other colorful numbers.
					
					A grand chorus "Day of the sun everlasting thanks to the great general" was given by 20,000 working people in Hamhung city, a grand chorus and dance "We will hold the leader in high esteem for all ages" by 10,000 women's union members in Hyesan and a grand chorus "People in Kangwon province who have grown stronger in mental power sing of the eternal day of the sun" by working people in Wonsan.
					
					 Members of the union of agricultural workers in South Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces delighted the working people with rhythmic dances and peasants' music at the venues of peasants' music and dance on the auspicious holiday.
					
					 Meanwhile, a lot of the people visited the 11th Kimilsungia Festival venue and Kimilsungia exhibitions in different provinces.

articles.title: Celebration Meetings Held across Country
articles.content:
Celebration Meetings Held across Country
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings and rallies were held in cities, counties, factories, enterprises and farms to celebrate Kim Jong Il's reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were officials of the party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 The speakers said at the meetings and rallies that Kim Jong Il's reelection to the top post of the state is the great honor and happiness of the army and people of the DPRK and a great auspicious event of the country and nation.
					
					 They spoke highly of Kim Jong Il praising him as a peerlessly great statesman and invincible and brilliant Songun commander as he has led the party, army and people to victory for half a century and demonstrated the dignity and might of the DPRK at the highest level.
					
					 They called for bringing about a leaping forward, holding the torchlight of a new revolutionary surge true to his Songun revolutionary leadership, and thus contribute to glorifying this year as a year of a decisive turn in building a great prosperous powerful nation.

articles.title: Evening Galas Held
articles.content:
Evening Galas Held
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Evening galas of youth and students took place here and in other parts of the country on Wednesday to commemorate the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Youth and students held an evening gala at the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium. They danced to the tune of such songs as "My Country Is the Eternal Country of the Leader," turning the plaza into a sea of dancers with ardent longing and boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 When "Our General Is the Best", "Korea, Sing of This Pride" and other songs reverberated through the plaza wrapped in a festive atmosphere, dances reached their climax.
					
					 The participants were filled with the determination to usher in a shining heyday of Songun Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem for all ages.
					
					 Similar pleasant events were held by youths in different parts of the country including South Hamgyong, North Phyongan, Ryanggang, Kangwon and North Hwanghae provinces to significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Reelection as NDC Chairman
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Reelection as NDC Chairman
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 14 to warmly congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), its vice-chairmen, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon and others.
					
					 Ri Ki Sok, vice-chairman and concurrently director general of the General Affairs Department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, in a report referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il was reelected chairman of the NDC of the DPRK at the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly according to the unanimous desire and will of all servicepersons and people.
					
					 He extended greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Il, representing the unanimous reverence of all Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan for him.
					
					 He spoke highly of Kim Jong Il who has firmly protected the socialist homeland by leading the confrontation with the imperialist allied forces to victory with his unique Songun politics in the rigorous days when the DPRK faced a stern trial.
					
					 All the officials of Chongryon and other compatriots will absolutely trust and follow Kim Jong Il and repose trust in the homeland, a cradle of compatriots' happiness and their beacon of hope, and defend it with the faith that they are sure to triumph as long as they are led by him, he stressed.
					
					 He called upon them to turn out in the patriotic movement of Chongryon with the honor of being overseas citizens of the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from the Chongryon Central Standing Committee was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 14 to commemorate the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending it were Chief Vice-Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon and others.
					
					Ho Jong Man in his report said that the hearts of the Koreans in Japan are overwhelmed with great national pride and honor as the Day of the Sun this year is being commemorated in an exciting period when General Secretary Kim Jong Il was reelected to the top post of the state and the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 was launched successfully, stirring the world.
					
					 He praised the President for liberating the country from the Japanese imperialists, defeating the U.S. imperialists and leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory and turning the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea which has grown stronger thanks to the single-minded unity, the invincible people's armed forces and solid foundation of the independent national economy would be unthinkable without the tireless efforts of the President, he stressed.
					
					 He lauded the President for putting forward a patriotic line and proposals for reunification, regarding national reunification as the supreme task of the nation and leading all the fellow countrymen to the movement for accomplishing the cause of reunification.
					
					 The President's whole life was a boundlessly noble life dedicated to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, he noted.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the undying feats performed by the President are being successfully carried forward and developed by Kim Jong Il, the reporter declared that the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan would bring about a fresh turn in the movement of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, keeping pace with the people in the homeland waging an all-out charge to unfailingly build a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of the birth of the President.
					
					 A letter of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Meanwhile, a photo exhibition was sponsored by the Chongryon Central Standing Committee on the same occasion.
					
					  Prior to it, a lecture was given by the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Italy
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully", a part of President Kim Il Sung's work "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee", was brought out in pamphlet by the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy on April 9.
					 This part of the work, published on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), deals with the achievements made by the WPK in its struggle for national reunification and the tasks for reunifying the country independently and peacefully. It also clarifies the new proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo on the basis of the three principles of national reunification and the ten-point policy to be carried out by the DFRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Swedish Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Swedish Political Party
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Sweden made public a statement "The DPRK has the right to use outer space for peaceful purposes" on April 6 in congratulation of the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					 The statement said that the signal achievement made by the DPRK in the development of space is a great encouragement to all the progressive forces of the whole world struggling for socialism and sovereignty.
					
					 It charged that the U.S.-led imperialist forces are malignantly slandering the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes as "threat" and "challenge".
					
					 The Communist Party of Sweden makes clear its stand that as a sovereign state, the DPRK has the right to develop satellite and rocket technology and the legitimate right to launch dozens or hundreds of satellites no matter whatever the imperialist forces may say, the statement said.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Peru, Poland, Bulgaria, France, India and Japan between April 6 and 8 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meetings were figures of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students, the Revolutionary Socialist Party and the Communist Party of Peru, the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for the Study of Juche Songun Policy, the Polish Communist Party, the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, the University of Paris 5 and the University of Sorbonne of France, the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il and the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said that the DPRK, not so big in territorial area and the number of population, is leading the imperialists by the nose while reliably defending its dignity. This is a shining fruition of the immortal contributions made by Kim Il Sung who built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence and laid a solid foundation of national defence capability, he added.
					
					 Roberto Carbonel Peso, president of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for the Study of Juche Songun Policy, said that what took the most important place in the exploits of Kim Il Sung is that he founded the immortal Juche idea and successfully applied it.
					
					 Juzef Lachut, chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, praised the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, stressing that he is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people with Songun Korea.
					
					 A member of the leadership of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said that Kim Il Sung is an prominent great man who always lives in the hearts of the progressive humankind for his enormous feats.
					
					 Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the Songun cause of Juche pioneered by Kim Il Sung is being successfully accomplished by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events held in Poland and Bulgaria.
					
					 Meanwhile, Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, released a statement on April 6 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
articles.content:
Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron este miercoles el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					Mientras se interpretaba la "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung", fue depositado al pie de la estatua del Presidente un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Los visitantes rindieron sublime homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien construyo en el suelo patrio la potencia socialista que es muy digna por su posicion independiente y garantiza la prosperidad de todas las generaciones venideras.
					
					 Este dia, los comandantes del Ejercito Popular de Corea visitaron el mismo lugar y rindieron homenaje al Presidente, fundador de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias e invencible comandante de acero. 
					
					  Lo hicieron tambien los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, oficiales y soldados del EPC, habitantes de distintos sectores, el Cuerpo Diplomatico, el de Agregados Militares y los representantes de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche, las delegaciones participantes  en el 11o Festival de Kimilsungias y otros huespedes extranjeros, las delegaciones de coreanos radicados en extranjero y compatriotas en ultramar.

articles.title: Cuadros del partido y Estado visitan Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido y Estado visitan Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (15 de abril) del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales realizaron este miercoles la visita a Mangyongdae.
					Ante todo, visitaron el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y recorrieron los objetos y datos historicos en que estan impregnadas las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente y la historia de la lucha de la familia revolucionaria de Mangyongdae donde nacieron los fervientes patriotas e indoblegables combatientes.
					
					Seguidamente, vieron los objetos historicos que estan conservados con esmero en la casa natal de Mangyongdae y tomaron una fotografia en el patio de la casa  natal.

articles.title: Depositan cestos de flores ante estatua de bronce de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Depositan cestos de flores ante estatua de bronce de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 97 aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares depositaron los cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente erguidas en distintas localidades.
					  Ante la estatua de bronce del Presidente erguida en la colina Mansu estaba puesto el cesto de flores enviado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  Fueron colocados los cestos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones sociales, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las unidades del EPC, los organos a todos los niveles, empresas,  fabricas, granjas y escuelas en esta capital.
					
					  Los visitantes rindieron tributo al Presidente recordando profundamente la preciosa vida del gran hombre simpar quien realizo inmortales hazanas ante la epoca y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					  Tambien fueron depositados los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente erguidas en varios lugares de la capital.
					
					  El mismo dia, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares de distintas partes del pais lo hicieron en sus respectivas localidades.

articles.title: Prosiguen actos festivos por eleccion de Kim Jong Il como titular del CDN
articles.content:
Prosiguen actos festivos por eleccion de Kim Jong Il como titular del CDN
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar en las ciudades, distritos, fabricas, empresas y granjas los actos para festejar la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  En las ocasiones participaron los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, el Poder, la administracion economica y de las organizaciones de masas de respectivas localidades, trabajadores de diferentes sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					  Los oradores senalaron que la reeleccion del Dirigente en el maximo cargo del Estado constituye la gloria y felicidad mas grandes del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y un inmenso jubilo para la patria y la nacion.
					
					  El Dirigente es el gran politico sin igual e invencible General insigne quien al conducir a la victoria al partido, el ejercito y el pueblo durante medio siglo, puso de pleno manifiesto la dignidad y el gallardo aspecto de la RPDC, subrayaron.
					
					  En fiel acato a la orientacion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar), hay que dar grandes saltos siguiendo la antorcha al nuevo y gran auge revolucionario para contribuir a la coronacion de este ano como el de cambios decisivos en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
